name: Thinking With Football
description:
|Thinking with football|

Thinking with football is a strategy game developed by AMSASH. 
The aim of the game is to shoot your ball all the way to the goal, but you only get one shot.
explore 10 levels as you try to finish the game and become the best footballer out there.

|Controls|

The controls are simple, click with your mouse or screen, aim, and shoot! it's that simple, and can be easily understood by most people

|Credits|

Main programmer: AMSASH
Art designer: AMSASH
Music maker: AI (ecrett music)
